instlnchaExtractor.mainSelect: select a.legacy, a.tipo, a.anlage, b.legacy, b.tipo, b.sparte, b.vstelle, ' ', b.bapertyp, b.spebene, b.anlart, b.nodisconct, b.ab, b.tariftyp, b.branche, b.aklasse, b.ableinh, b.service, b.deregstat, c.legacy, c.tipo, c.datefrom, c.euirole_tech, c.ext_ui, c.grid_id, c.grid_level, c.timefrom, c.uistrutyp, c.uitype from instlncha_key a, instlncha_data b, instlncha_pod c where a.legacy = b.legacy and a.legacy = c.legacy
